data.title: Famous birthdays list for today, June 15, 2024 includes celebrities Ice Cube, Courteney Cox
data.meta_description: Ice Cube and Courteney Cox share a birthday today. Check out our photo slideshow of celebrities and other famous people with birthdays on June 15, 2024 and find out a fun fact about each person.
data.text:
Birthday wishes go out to Ice Cube, Courteney Cox and all the other celebrities with birthdays today. Check out our slideshow below to see photos of famous people turning a year older on June 15th and learn an interesting fact about each of them.

Top celebrity birthdays on June 15, 2024

Actor Jim Belushi turns 70

Fun fact: Performed at the 50th anniversary special for ‘American Banstand’

Actress Helen Hunt turns 61

Fun fact: Her father was actor and director Gordon Hunt

Actress Courteney Cox turns 60

Fun fact: One of her first TV show appearances was in an episode of ‘The Love Boat’

Rapper Ice Cube turns 55

Fun fact: Directed an episode of ESPN’s ‘30 for 30′ series

Actress Leah Remini turns 54

Fun fact: Once auditioned for the role of Monica on ‘Friends’

Actor Neil Patrick Harris turns 51

Fun fact: Appeared as The Toymaker in an episode of ‘Doctor Who’ last year

More celebrities with birthdays today

Singer Ruby Nash Garnett of Ruby and the Romantics is 90. Guitarist Leo Nocentelli of The Meters is 78. Actor Simon Callow (“Amadeus,” ″Shakespeare in Love”) is 75. Singer Russell Hitchcock of Air Supply is 75. Singer Steve Walsh (Kansas) is 73. Country singer Terri Gibbs is 70. Actor Julie Hagerty (“Airplane,” “Marriage Story”) is 69. Actor Polly Draper (“thirtysomething”) is 69. Guitarist Brad Gillis of Night Ranger is 67. Actor Eileen Davidson (“The Young and the Restless,” “Days of Our Lives”) is 65. Drummer Scott Rockenfield of Queensryche is 61. Guitarist Tony Ardoin of River Road is 60. Guitarist Michael Britt of Lonestar is 58. Drummer Rob Mitchell of Sixpence None The Richer is 58. Actor Jake Busey (“Starship Troopers”) is 53. Trombone player T-Bone Willy of Save Ferris is 52. Actor Greg Vaughan (“Days of Our Lives,” “General Hospital”) is 51. Actor Elizabeth Reaser (“Twilight”) is 49. Singer Dryden Mitchell of Alien Ant Farm is 48. Former child actor Christopher Castile (“Step By Step,” ″Beethoven” films) is 44. Guitarist Billy Martin of Good Charlotte is 43. Actor Jordi Vilasuso (“The Young and the Restless”) is 43. Guitarist Wayne Sermon of Imagine Dragons is 40. Actor Denzel Whitaker is 34. Actor Sterling Jerins (“The Conjuring” films) is 20.

Other popular or historical birthdays on June 15th

Erik Erikson, psychologist

Sam Giancana, mobster

Mike Holmgren, former NFL coach and executive (76)

with The Associated Press
